goal: Maintain memory bank clarity and efficiency by restructuring files and offloading details when core files exceed 300 words
acceptance_criteria: All core memory bank files remain under 300 words each
Essential context is preserved in core files
Detailed content is properly offloaded to details/ subdirectory
One-line mentions with links replace detailed content in core files
Files use concise, clear language without redundancy
All links to detail files are functional

features.name: Analyze Core File Length
features.test_scenario: Given memory bank core files, When I count words in each file, Then I can identify files exceeding 300 words
features.expected_result: List of files that need cleanup with word counts

features.name: Identify Content for Offloading
features.test_scenario: Given a core file exceeding 300 words, When I scan for detailed content, Then I identify sections suitable for extraction
features.expected_result: List of sections to offload with appropriate detail file names

features.name: Create Detail Files
features.test_scenario: Given content to offload, When I create detail files, Then files follow naming convention and are organized properly
features.expected_result: Detail files created in memory-bank/details/ with correct naming: {prefix}_{category}_{name}.md

features.name: Replace with One-Line Mentions
features.test_scenario: Given detailed content moved to detail file, When I update core file, Then brief one-line mention with link replaces original content
features.expected_result: Core file contains concise mention linking to detail file

features.name: Apply Concise Writing Style
features.test_scenario: Given verbose text in core files, When I apply cleanup rules, Then content becomes concise without losing meaning
features.expected_result: Bullet points, active voice, no filler words, tables for structured data

features.name: Remove Redundancy
features.test_scenario: Given duplicate information across files, When I review all files, Then redundant content is consolidated or removed
features.expected_result: No duplicate information, cross-file consistency maintained

features.name: Validate Cleanup
features.test_scenario: Given cleaned memory bank, When I verify all criteria, Then all core files are under 300 words with functional links
features.expected_result: Validation checklist passes: file size, links, consistency, clarity
